name: The Shadowy Temple
description:
The Shadowy Temple puzzle game where you delve down into a desert ruin made by Al Ward and Kieran Everett for the Ludum Dare 48 Game Jam in 72 hours. This was our first Ludum Dare game jam game.

The game was made in Unreal Engine 4. Al worked with the engine and Kieran produced the assets and sounds.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/the-shadowy-temple
